Docs.param: Describes the parameters of the whitening process for each column pair.
Docs.summary: Takes columns filled with a vector of random variables with a known covariance matrix into a set of new variables whose covariance is the identity matrix, meaning that they are uncorrelated and each have variance 1.

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.HalLearnersCatalog.VectorWhiten (catalog, inputColumn, outputColumn, kind, eps, maxRows, pcaNum)

Docs.param: Name of the column resulting from the transformation of . Null means is replaced.
Whitening constant, prevents division by zero.
Maximum number of rows used to train the transform.
In case of PCA whitening, indicates the number of components to retain.
Docs.summary: Takes column filled with a vector of random variables with a known covariance matrix into a set of new variables whose covariance is the identity matrix, meaning that they are uncorrelated and each have variance 1.
